attributes.review: when I downloaded this app. At first I was unimpressed with it because when opening the app, it immediately crashed from time to time whenever I wanted to learn more about the campaign and trump. Overall, this app needs an update or improve the crashes.
attributes.title: Crashing

attributes.review: I really wanted to like this app but apparently it was developed by an absolute cement head because it does not function at any level. It consistently crashes and does not perform features it claims to be able to. I was really hoping to support our commander in chief but please make this better!
attributes.title: Unusable

attributes.review: I was so excited to have all of my trump information and news in one place, but this app was just terrible. You can’t listen to music unless you force quit the app and the interface and user friendliness is terrible. I would not recommend this app to anyone, not even my worst enemy.
attributes.title: Dissapointed

attributes.review: This app is so incredibly racist. I don’t like it and this app is the reason why everyone in this world has depression. Please get this off the App Store immediately please listen to our words. I think America doesn’t need this app if you want less people to be depressed and less people to die awful people....
attributes.title: Oh my god

attributes.review: downloaded to keep up with The president, this is the biggest waste of space on my phone!! glitchy, annoying, and horrible login process, notifications are overwhelming and NO helpful information can be found! save your own time and SKIP!!!
attributes.title: horrible app

attributes.review: this app is horrible, i am just trying to support my amazing president and his campaign but I got the app and it’s making my phone glitch and shut down multiple times, i know this is the radical left trying to hack into the amazing re-election of our president i hope it gets fixed soon
attributes.title: Radical lefts

attributes.review: ⚡️yep, I’ve been on tik tok🌈 since it was musically. and no it doesn’t need to be taken down. gen z🌟loves tik tok, it’s the one 🧚‍♀️thing we all have in common. I didn’t realize✨ everyone has paragraphs so im gonna do the same. we need💕 a president who supports the interests that the younger⚡️ generation has because we are the future. ✨🧚‍♀️⚡️🌈
attributes.title: ✨here from tik tok for tik tok🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: My wife of three years left me after she found out i have this app. I truly hate it here and i blame Donnie for my wife leaving me. We had a family together, two sons and a daughter on the way, and she really left me because of this app. But also TikTok and we Stan Charli for clear skin
attributes.title: My wife left because of this ✨✨

attributes.review: This was literally the worst app I’ve ever seen, would rather throw my phone in the Hudson River than have to look at it for one more second. Let’s just say I deleted it within 30 seconds of having to use it. Why is this even on the App Store. Wish I could give less than 1 star.
attributes.title: Worst app ever 🤮🤮🤡

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep up with the cheeto in office and his plans. the app was so full of false information and lies it caused me to have a stroke!!! i went to the hospital and almost died! i tried one more time to read the news and had a seizure reading trumps words 🤢 this app is awful and harmful and spreading false news
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
